content:
We are looking for a developer with .NET C# proficiency to work on the Vonk FHIR Server and related ecosystem, as well as to help our clients use Vonk in the field. We are partnered with Firely, the people behind Vonk, Forge, Simplifier, and the FHIR DevDays conferences. Candidates are ideally in the Boston area and able to commute to our downtown office to work. Possibility to have remote work in the US / eastern time zone. There is likely some amount of travel. We offer a competitive salary, self-directed 401K plan, 100% coverage of health insurance premiums, free MBTA transit pass, an annual professional development and conference budget, and other perks.

https://apply.workable.com/vermonster/j/ED9ACC26F8/
